metadata.name: Maria #1916
metadata.description: Following up the genesis drop of Cometary by Paul Wong and to commemorate the 60th birthday of Wong Ka Kui, the legendary rock musician from the band Beyond, HarmoniXX is once again launching a highly memorable NFT collection. Using modern audio optimization techniques in conjunction with AI, an unreleased original demo made prior to his tragic passing has been restored and generated into 2000 unique song clips. The corresponding generative Album Covers employs a colorful style of pop art known as WPAP and integrates prominent dates and landmarks that celebrates momentous occasions in Wong Kai Kui's career. Through this never-before-released masterpiece, Wong Ka Kui gives everyone hope and strength, and with his perpetual rock and roll spirit, he inspires generations of people to move forward without being defined.
